av: Displays the Avatar of the mentioned user. If no user is mentioned, it will show your personal Avatar!
kick: Kicks the mentioned user from the Server!
ban: Bans the mentioned user from the server!
help: Your already here... but this command shows the command list, and allows you to get help with the commands!
invite: Gives the invite URL for Risa!
ping: Shows Risa's ping to Discord Servers!
timer:
`(hours) (minutes) (seconds)` 

 Allows you to set a timer!
